author: ehu
msg: (create_translation_baton): Don't initialize the baton character arrays
to '\0', because nothing depends on it anyway.
(translate_chunk): Renamed destination stream parameter to dst from d.
(translated_stream_baton): Add iterpool, which is used as pool was before.
At the same time, use pool to allocate the baton, so destruction of the
(translated_stream_read): Use iterpool slightly different, so there is
no need to create a pool on each call to this function.
(svn_subst_stream_translated): Create a separate pool to allocate the baton
in (and the rest of the stream's data); that way, we can release all

author: dlr
msg: Add commit-email.rb, verify-po.py and path to mailer.py.

author: dlr
msg: * www/project_links.html: Added Insurrection, a SVN web viewer.

author: julianfoad
msg: Make svn_wc_get_status_editor2() honour its API promise to work even if its
'traversal_info' argument is null.  (We haven't yet called it in such a way.)
Don't let a null traversal_info get in the way of handling externals.
Don't try to modify traversal_info if it's null.
Make the local 'externals' hash independent of traversal_info.
